## 2.

```{r}
moon_icon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://media.istockphoto.com/id/1004728748/vector/moon-icon-flat-design.jpg?s=1024x1024&w=is&k=20&c=fYH6eM0A_xymXZ_ZdQ19AHhBPwsQyh4Cz8EMKjYaIlk=",
  iconWidth = 30,
  iconHeight = 30
)

state_coord <- read_table("state_capital_coord.txt",
                          col_names = c("State", "lat", "lng")) |> 
  filter(State != "US")
state_coord |> 
  leaflet() |> 
  addTiles() |> 
  addMarkers(
    lng = state_coord$lng,
    lat = state_coord$lat,
    icon = moon_icon,
    popup = paste(state_coord$lng,
                  state_coord$lat,
                  state_coord$State)
  )

```
